content.rendered:
‘My rules,
my platform’

The freedom of having his own video platform not only brought entertainer John Williams closer to his fans, but also gave him unprecedented creativity and a new online revenue stream.

John Williams: “Johnny’s World allows me to be closer to my audience, all according to my own rules. After all, it’s my platform. Anything I want, when I want, I can share with whomever I want on Johnny’s World.”

More freedom and
grip on fans

On his own video platform Johnny’s World, John Williams can give live performances to his heart’s content to an infinitely large audience. The live chat module allows his fans to react to the show as it happens, pass on requests to John and share their passion for R&B music. Moreover, John is free to create his own tickets and therefore offer both live streams and on-demand content for a fee.
